text: Gunilla Elisabet Dukure Bergström (3 July 1942 – 25 August 2021) was a Swedish author, journalist, and illustrator. She was best known for her series of children's books about the character Alfie Atkins. She was born in Gothenburg, Sweden. Bergström died on 25 August 2021 in Stockholm, Sweden at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish novelists Category:Swedish journalists Category:Swedish illustrators Category:Writers from Gothenburg Category:20th-century artists Category:21st- century artists
title: Gunilla Bergström
